thread.title: Kendall Jenner showers big sister Kim Kardashian with praise in sweet message
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner showers big sister Kim Kardashian with praise in sweet message

author: Vicki Newman
title: Kendall Jenner showers big sister Kim Kardashian with praise in sweet message
text:
Kendall Jenner showers big sister Kim Kardashian with praise in sweet message The model had a lot to say about her older sibling Share Kendall Jenner is a big fan of sister Kim (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kendall Jenner has a lot of respect for her big sister Kim Kardashian. 
The 21-year-old model praised her older sibling as "one of the smartest people" she knows. 
Kendall says Kim has "incredible entrepreneurial skills" and being really "innovative". 
Writing on her official website, Kendall shared: "She's definitely one of the smartest and most innovative people I know. 
"Kim's entrepreneurial skills are incredible. Kim's Birkin collection can't be beat. The one North painted is so special. The West's Christmas decoration game is on point. I wouldn't mind decking my house out like hers next year." Kendall says Kim is one of the smartest people she knows (Photo: Splash News) 
The sweet comments will no doubt cheer the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star up as she has had a rough six months, having been robbed at gunpoint in Paris last October. 
The mother-of-two opened up about her ordeal on the family's E! reality show and her mother Kris Jenner feels that was "very therapeutic" for the star. 
She said: "When we started filming again and getting up and running, you know obviously Kim was around because we all practically live together on the street. And we started filming and what was coming out of that was very therapeutic for her, I think. To just explain to us and walk us through. 
"She just thinks that it might bring some awareness. You know, it's changed the way we live our lives and just the way we take care of our kids and our grandchildren. So it's been a process. I locked all the doors and changed the locks cause I'm afraid." Kim has had a tough time lately (Photo: GC Images) 
Kris finds it "upsetting" to watch the footage back and admits she wants to cry whenever she thinks about what happened to her daughter. 
She added: "I was watching it and I was balling - balling when I saw it. 
"And I just saw some of it. I couldn't even watch the whole thing it was so upsetting. It was such an upsetting time and something so awful happened to somebody you love so much. And it's just like it chokes me up every time to think about it. 
"No one can get through the first few minutes without getting hysterical. Like, I get choked up just thinking about it and talking about it. But its remarkable to listen to her tell the story and she does that ... moment by moment." Like us on Facebook
